channel.title: Spokane County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Spokane County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-2 East Approaching WA-206
item.description: US-2 East Approaching WA-206 to Mount Spokane State Park.

item.title: US-2 East/US-395 North at US-2/US-395 Split
item.description: US-2 East/US-395 North at US-2/US-395 split in Spokane. Turn right for US-2 East to Newport.

item.description: US-2 East/US-395 North (Division St.) approaching US-2/US-395 Split in Spokane. Use US-2 east for Newport; US-395 north for Colville.

item.description: US-2 East/US-395 North (Division St.) approaching WA-291 North (Francis Ave.) to Suncrest and Riverside State Park.

item.description: Distance marker on US-2 west. Distance to Fairchild AFB, Grand Coulee Dam, and Wenatchee.

item.title: Sunset Blvd. at US-2
item.description: Sunset Blvd. west at US-2 west to Davenport. Use left lane to continue on Sunset Blvd. to the Spokane Airport.

item.title: Sunset Blvd. West Approaching US-2
item.description: Sunset Blvd. West approaching US-2. Use right lane for US-2 West to Davenport; left lane for the Spokane Airport.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 277A and 277B
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 277A - Garden Springs. Approaching Exit 277B - US-2 West/Spokane Airport. US-2 east follows I-90 from here into downtown Spokane.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 276 - Geiger Blvd./Grove Road.

item.description: US-195 South at Spangle junction. Turn left for Spangle and Upper Columbia Academy. Turn right to Cheney.

item.description: Distance marker on US-195 south. First distance marker on US-195 southbound. Distance to Colfax and Pullman.

item.description: First US-195 shield on US-195 southbound. Taken just south of I-90 in Spokane.

item.description: I-90 west at Exit 281 - US-2/Newport/US-395 North/Colville/Division St.. US-395 joins I-90 west to Ritzville. US-2 joins I-90 west through Spokane.

item.description: I-90 West approaching Exit 280B - Lincoln St.

item.description: E 2nd Ave. approaching I-90 West. Use left lane for I-90 West/Seattle.

item.description: Thor St. South approaching I-90 in Spokane.

item.description: Freya St. South at Future US-395 North. Use Future US-395 north for Colville and US-2.

item.title: Future US-395 South - North Spokane Corridor
item.description: Future US-395 South - North Spokane Corridor. The current alignment of US-395 will be along Division St. until the completion of the North Spokane Corridor.

item.title: US-395 South at North Spokane Corridor
item.description: US-395 South at North Spokane Corridor. Use left lane to continue south on the freeway along the North Spokane Corridor. Use the right lane for the US-395 South/To I-90/Division St./Spokane interchange. The next three exits on the North Spokane Corridor (Future US-395) are US-2, Parksmith Drive, and Francis Ave.

item.title: US-395 South - Division St. Interchange
item.description: US-395 South approaching US-395 South/To I-90/Division St./Spokane interchange. US-395 leaves the freeway southbound here. When the North Spokane Corridor is connected to I-90, US-395 will be rerouted away from Division St. onto the new freeway.

item.title: US-395 South - Hatch Road IC
item.description: US-395 south approaching Hatch Road interchange. This is the northern end of the new North Spokane Corridor, a freeway which will eventually have a direct connection to I-90.

item.title: US-395 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 south leaving Deer Park. Distance to Spokane and I-90.

item.description: Maple St. South at I-90 west onramp to Seattle.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 281 - Division St., and Exit 282 - WA-290 East/Trent Ave./Hamilton St.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 280
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 280 - Maple St./Lincoln St. Use next two exits for Spokane City Center.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 279
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 279 - US-195 South/Colfax/Pullman. US-195 begins here and ends near Lewiston, ID at US-95.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 277A and 277B
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 277A - Garden Springs. Approaching US-2 West/Spokane Airport/Fairchild AFB. US-2 east follows I-90 from here into downtown.

item.description: Marshall Road south at I-90 East onramp at Exit 276.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 276
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 276 - Geiger Field/State Patrol.

item.title: US-2 East at I-90/US-395
item.description: US-2 east at I-90. Use right lane for I-90 West to Ritzville. Left lanes for I-90/US-2 East to Spokane.

item.title: US-2 East Approaching I-90
item.description: US-2 east approaching I-90. Use right lane for I-90 west to Ritzville.

item.title: Spokane Airport Road at US-2/BL-90
item.description: Airport Drive at BL-90 to Spokane, and US-2 West to I-90 and West Spokane.

item.title: Maple St. South in Spokane - Old US Route Marker
item.description: Shields for old routes - US-195/US-2/US-10/US-395 on Maple Street. This is interesting in a few ways. First of all, the stacking of the route numbers within the marker itself. Secondly - US-10 is decommissioned in the western US. US-195 used to end in Sandpoint, ID - following the current route of US-2 through Spokane. Currently US-195 ends a few miles to the west at I-90. Finally, there is no mention of I-90 on this sign, which is where this sign is posted at an onramp to I-90.

item.title: WA-278 to US-95 Idaho
item.description: WA-278 To US-95/Idaho. Taken at the corner of W Emma and S 1st St., in Rockford. The Idaho border is about 5 miles to the east.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 277AB
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 277B - US-2 West/Spokane Airport/Fairchild AFB and Exit 277A - Garden Springs. This was taken on a snowy morning.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 282
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 282 - WA-290/Trent Ave./Hamilton Street. I-90 East to Coeur d’Alene (ID) overheads.
